original_title: The Nolans - The Ultimate Girls' Night!
overview: THE NOLANS The Ultimate Girls' Night (2009 UK) set - Join the Nolan sisters as they celebrate their amazing reunion with their 'Ultimate Girls Night' filmed live at the Manchester Apollo. Packed with classic diva anthems from the start including 'I Will Survive', 'It's Raining Men' and 'Chain Reaction', also some of their biggest hits with 'Attention To Me', 'Chemistry' and everyone's favourite 'I'm In The Mood For Dancing'. All as you've never seen them before.
title: The Nolans - The Ultimate Girls' Night!
